go_data.justification: The expression of TRIP was significantly reduced when lymphocytes were stimulated to proliferate via antigen receptors.
TRIP-specific probes detected a ~2.1-kb mRNA species present in various tissues, including thymus.
TRIP-specific probes detected a ~2.1-kb mRNA species present in various tissues, including spleen.
TRIP-specific probes detected a ~2.1-kb mRNA species present in various tissues, including testes.
